about_the_game:
Cube Hero Odyssey is a hack-and-slash, monster slaying roguelite, where you play as a caped hero wielding his trusty anti-fragile blade.
Dive into combat with a myriad of creative build paths with skills and passive abilities!
Each playthrough promises a new experience as the world of Celestia is beautifully shown in colourful & stylish procedurally generated maps!

𝙈𝙀𝘾𝙃𝘼𝙉𝙄𝘾𝘼𝙇 𝙎𝙆𝙄𝙇𝙇 𝙈𝙀𝙀𝙏𝙎 𝙎𝙏𝙍𝘼𝙏𝙀𝙂𝙔

Standard roguelites may have combat that feels closer to bullet hell, where your abilities can wipe out entire waves of minor enemies.
In Cube Hero Odyssey, combat is slow and methodical; each enemy can present a challenge to overcome!
Master dodging, attack with precise timing, and make strategic use of your skills as even a single enemy could take you down!

➜ 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗖𝗘𝗗𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗟𝗟𝗬 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗘𝗥𝗔𝗧𝗘𝗗

Each round features a uniquely designed environment, complete with varying hurdles and enemies lurking! From gentle greenery to fierce lava landscapes, explore to guarantee you claim all your loot!

➜ 𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗔𝗖𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗕𝗢𝗦𝗦𝗘𝗦

Every few rounds, go head-to-head against colossal beasts, and test your might! Be careful with these giants... Or you'll be defeated in the blink of an eye!

➜ 𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗩𝗘 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗕𝗔𝗧 𝗕𝗨𝗜𝗟𝗗𝗦

Experiment with diverse builds and unlock powerful skills, tailoring your caped hero to your gameplay style for various tactical advantages!
The game provides 3 types of modifications, called Mods: Skill Mods (active skills), Stat Mods (stat upgrades), and Effect Mods (passive effects) as well as a newly added feature called Bloodlines, where you choose from one of the many character archetypes to have a distinguished start with unique traits!

➜ 𝗥𝗢𝗚𝗨𝗘𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗘 𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦 𝗚𝗔𝗠𝗘𝗣𝗟𝗔𝗬

Dying is inevitable, and it'll put you back to round 1 where you can retry with your newly gained knowledge and practice. On top of that, you can craft a different build as you play to tackle your foes in a new way!

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗾𝘂𝗲𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗖𝗨𝗕𝗘𝗦! 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗢𝗗𝗬𝗦𝗦𝗘𝗬!

Cube Hero Odyssey caters to everyone who enjoys mastering combat systems and evolving their approach through inventive gameplay strategies! The game offers a rich blend of challenging encounters and creative build paths, ideal for players looking for an engaging roguelite experience in a colourful, cute cube-like world.

Paraverse Studio is a team of three. And this is our first foray into the roguelite genre. We are actively working on the game regularly.
Join our to share your ideas or any thoughts, and contribute to the game's development. Or, just come to chat!
